db:abstract.db:para: The QAxServer module is a Windows-only static library that you can use to turn a standard Qt binary into a COM server.

db:article.db:para: The QAxServer module is a Windows-only static library that you can use to turn a standard Qt binary into a COM server.

db:listitem.db:para: The QAxAggregated class is an abstract base class for implementations of additional COM interfaces.
The QAxBindable class provides an interface between a QWidget and an ActiveX client.
The QAxFactory class defines a factory for the creation of COM components.

db:section.db:title: Detailed Description
db:section.db:para: QAxServer is part of the Active Qt module. The Building ActiveX servers in Qt page contains information about turning a Qt binary into a COM server
